definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This gave us a seat in the European parliament for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 這也讓我們首次在歐洲議會中獲得了一個席位。

sentences.english: THE SWEDISH Pirate Party has been favoured to win at least one seat in the European parliament this week.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典盜版黨很可能在本週歐洲議會的選舉中獲勝。

sentences.english: More properly, the new office-holder will be the standing president of the European Council (the body that represents national leaders).
sentences.chinese: 更準確地來說，新的主席將會是歐洲議會的常務主席。

sentences.english: The European Parliament represents the European public opinion.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲議會是歐洲民意的代表。

sentences.english: Buzek is currently the president of the European Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 布澤克是歐洲議會現任議長。

sentences.english: The People's Party group, as the largest political group in the European Parliament, is duty-bound in every means.
sentences.chinese: 人民黨黨團作爲歐洲議會第一大黨團更是責無旁貸。

sentences.english: This is a highly irresponsible and unfounded accusation in disregard of the facts.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲議會罔顧事實，妄加評論，無端指責，極不負責。

sentences.english: The European Parliament has given the green light for member states to cut persistent file-sharers off from the net.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲議會准許其成員國去除網上宿存的文件共享者。

sentences.english: And where national vetoes are eroded, there is the European Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 哪裏有國家的否決權被侵蝕，哪裏就有歐洲議會。

sentences.english: He spoke to the European Parliament in Strasbourg, France.
sentences.chinese: 他在法國的斯特拉斯堡向歐洲議會發表了講話。

definition: lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
François Hollande (1954-), French Socialist politician, president of France 2012-2017
Netanyahu (name)/Benjamin Netanyahu (1949-), Israeli Likud politician, prime minister 1996-1999 and from 2009

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1
Shi4 jie4 Jing1 ji4 Lun4 tan2
